wifi.title:
The new power 
 of the network.
wifi.description: The European high-end network technology to boost network resilience. A holistic Network-as-a-Service solution—simple, secure, and reliable.
wifi.sparkle1: Innovative WLAN & 5G technology made in Europe
wifi.sparkle2: Strong security & easy to use via app

list.title: Home
list.subtitle: For a smart home.
list.description: A connected home with seamless & self-optimising, secure Wi-Fi. The perfect solution for working from home and your whole family.

list.title: Business
list.subtitle: For a networked company.
list.description: AirZen's secure & innovative solutions keep your team & your customers connected anywhere & anytime.

list.title: Education
list.subtitle: For a digital future.
list.description: Digital transformation, homeschooling & administration. A complex WLAN with foolproof handling that just works.

list.title: Industrial
list.subtitle: For digital progress.
list.description: Innovation needs individual solutions—even at a large scale. AirZen helps solve industrial networking challenges.

swiper.title: From Europe. For Europe.
swiper.content: AirZen manufactures state-of-the-art network technology in Europe. Secure WLAN, developed for individual requirements and high usability. Committed to its origins, AirZen helps its customers keep up with the latest data protection and security policies.

swiper.title: Our strength. Your protection.
swiper.content: Every company is unique. So, network solutions have to be too. With customised Wi-Fi solutions built on "Security by Design", AirZen maximises security and reduces the complexity of your IT for all users.
swiper.sparkle2: Managed service to unburden your IT department

swiper.title: One for all and all in one.
swiper.content: AirZen is more than just an IT manufacturer, but your integral IT partner. From development and production to support, AirZen offers custom-fit WLAN solutions for companies across all industries and public institutions—all from a single source.
swiper.sparkle2: End-to-end IT partner with German-speaking live support

swiper.title: Better and better.
swiper.content: AirZen's networking solutions are designed to be exceptionally easy to deploy, to provide secure Wi-Fi access and to deliver the reliability that digital workplaces need, thereby providing a flexible platform that is constantly evolving and offering new services.
swiper.sparkle1: Individual user passwords for maximum security
swiper.sparkle2: Plug & play for worry-free set-up without IT knowledge

contact.title: Contact

simply.title: Smart living. Smart WLAN.
simply.description: Smart Home and New Work—a networked home needs technology that does exactly what it is supposed to do. A trouble-free network that is secure and provides absolute privacy. An app that can provide overview, support, and control without being complicated.

safehome.title: Home safe Home
safehome.description: Security starts with the network. The AirZen Security Package separates your professional and private networks. Additional extensive security features, such as the live filter against malicious websites and virus botnets, are available and can be expanded with parental control functions. Worry-free redefined—directly at the source.
list:
My Home Is My Castle. 
 Get protection & control on your WLAN.

reliable.title: ALWAYS CONNECTED.
reliable.description: Finally, professional WLAN technology for your home—as powerful as in industry and as user-friendly as never before. Three AirZen nodes per set ensure seamless Wi-Fi connections and prevent Wi-Fi frustrations thanks to sophisticated mesh technology. This means usage, management, and security are just like in your office but at home.
list:
Robust connections 
 The AirZen set offers WLAN everywhere in your home.

easy.title: SIMPLE IS GOOD. AUTOMATIC IS BETTER.
easy.description: Unpack, hook up and go. The network configures itself almost by itself, thanks to automated set-up—no technician is required. All you need is an Internet connection. And self-maintenance and administration run just as smoothly as the installation. It sounds relaxed, and it is.
list:
Family management via app 
 Individual passwords for each family member.

Smart Roaming 
 The best connection to the AirZen nodes—automatically.

Secure Smart Home 
 All ‟things‟ have their own network.

swiper.title: SIMPLE IS GOOD. AUTOMATIC IS BETTER.
swiper.description: Unpack, hook up and go. The network configures itself almost by itself, thanks to automated set-up—no technician is required. All you need is an Internet connection. And self-maintenance and administration run just as smoothly as the installation. It sounds relaxed, and it is.
list:
Family management via app 
 Individual passwords for each family member.

Smart Roaming 
 The best connection to the AirZen nodes—automatically.

Secure Smart Home 
 All ‟things‟ have their own network.

swiper.title: Digital Detox.
swiper.description: Are you taking a digital break at your dining table? Simply pause selected devices with our app while the music stream continues—all at your fingertips. Individual, secure access is given to each family member and smart home device. This way, network usage can be restricted and controlled.
list:
Individual pause function 
 Internet break in just a few seconds via app.

Internet Timer 
 Control when the WLAN can be used.

Parental control function 
 Protection against harmful influences over the Internet.

swiper.title: Always up to date
swiper.description: Post-update is pre-update. Our holistic Network-as-a-Service approach provides reliability through automatic software updates to maximise protection and WLAN quality assurance. And you can rely on AirZen in case of trouble with quick, instant live chat through the AirZen app.
list:
Botnet Blocker 
 A virus needs instructions. We make it more difficult.

Automated updates 
 Security through the latest firmware & security filters.

Malware filter 
 Malicious websites are extensively filtered.

step1.title: Good to go in minutes
step1.description: For remote workers and families: The AirZen set offers a trouble-free and easy-to-use high-end network solution for your home.

step2.roomSize:

step2.description:
The AirZen set includes a minimum of 3 routers: our nodes. With it, we guarantee a stable connection of up to 200 square metres.
 We recommend installing one node for each additional 60 square metres or new external location, respectively.

boost.title: Boost Your Business
boost.description:
Networking management for businesses of all shapes and sizes. AirZen is ideal for organisations looking to introduce new technologies, launch new premises or outsource network management. 
AirZen is known for simple and secure network management solutions, made in Europe and the introduction of innovative remote maintenance.

newwork.title: New Work made easy!
newwork.description:
Post-update is pre-update. In remote workplaces, your network is particularly exposed to many potential threats. 
 Our platform is tied to a licensing model to stay ahead of the game, including numerous security features operating in the background.
list:
Technology made in Europe 
 Technology & administration perfectly combined.

Automated updates 
 Security through the latest firmware & security filters.

Security features 
 Proactively fend off botnets & malware.

preparesuccess.title: Set up for success!
preparesuccess.description:
The smart site and user management, including direct support via live chat, make life easier for businesses with many locations. 
 Via our app, you can quickly expand or update your network dynamically and invite or block individual users safely. 
 Even your team can enter and interact via a self-service portal. On top of that, you can define your own security standards—the best Feng Shui for your staff and your WLAN.
preparesuccess.sparkle1: Ease the workload on IT via remote site management

secure.title: Safe for sure!
secure.description:
From now on, IT security is the boss business because, with AirZen, you do not have to be an expert. We will help you and your IT team build resilience into your network. 
 Our task is to keep hardware and software up to date while ensuring that your IT is secure by design. 
 The AirZen tools assist you in seamlessly integrating cybersecurity into your network—in your office, vehicles, home workspace or other enterprise segments.
list:
Secure team management 
 Unique passwords for every staff member.

Device Management 
 Add structure to the multitude of end devices.

Self-service portal 
 Add new staff members securely & easily.

start.content:
No matter what your company is currently dealing with, together, we will find a suitable network solution using our hardware and router system. We provide you with a one-stop solution! 
 If required, we offer you comprehensive direct support ranging from initial planning to ongoing maintenance.

classwifi.title: Classy WLAN!
classwifi.description:
For today's education, a modern network is indispensable. AirZen brings reliable and secure Internet connectivity to educational institutions. Ready-to-use hardware, a school-friendly set-up, mobile user management and all-round, worry-free IT support.
And the best thing about AirZen technology: it's child's play to operate. The next-generation network does not need an on-site IT department.

reliable.title: Education goes digital!
reliable.description:
AirZen is the solution for complex requirements of any type or size of educational institution—and it is simple to use.
Apart from seamless Wi-Fi coverage, AirZen guarantees rock solid network stability, no matter how many devices are online. Right from their mobile phones, administrators can quickly provide access and manage everything on the move.
No IT training is required, as the app makes operation easy as ABC. With AirZen, you maintain a first-class network.
list:
Secure User Management 
 Individual passwords and permissions for each user.

Managed Service 
 Protect & control your network without in-house IT.

Quality Assurance 
 Maintain stable connections and control connectivity.

secure.title: Security first!
secure.description:
From primary school to the auditorium—there are vast amounts of sensitive data in the education network. AirZen ensures a high IT security level by combining high-quality vendor service and GDPR-compliant cybersecurity concepts.
Also, safeguard your students and teachers with their private Wi-Fi passwords, parental controls and separated connections.
secure.sparkle1:
GDPR-compliant network solution 
 with innovative remote maintenance.
secure.sparkle2:
Automated updates 
 Maximum security with the latest firmware & security filters.

easy.title: Simple as ABC!
easy.description:
Notebooks out and go. Using AirZen’s self-service portal, students and teachers get quick and easy access to the Internet. So, everyone can focus on the lesson, and all the other things—from set-up to maintenance with self-learning software—run virtually automatic.
This means you don't need a large IT department or specialist knowledge since AirZen directly provides all hardware and support. In other words: Everything works out with AirZen.
easy.sparkle1:
User-Management 
 WLAN management: Easier than ever before.
easy.sparkle2:
Plug & Play 
 Easy to install with the AirZen app.
easy.sparkle3:
Support Live Chat 
 Direct support without delays.

everything.title: Solution-oriented.
everything.description: With its stability, security and user-friendliness, AirZen offers extensive customisation options for corporate networks in many business sectors, and novel possibilities for handling processes, offering new services and defining brand-new standards for Industry 4.0.

reliable.title: Ideas are aplenty.
reliable.description:
From initial idea to hardware—everything from one source. Do you need a reliable network or have new requirements for your existing one?
AirZen technology is built for professional use and is designed to provide a high-performance network that meets demanding industrial requirements. Whether automation, smart management, remote control or remote maintenance—AirZen will develop the ideal network solution with you, providing exceptionally robust and reliable network coverage.

hint.title: Technology made in Europe
hint.description: Smart network technology for innovative industrial projects.

hint.title: Suitable for harsh environments
hint.description: All-weather outdoor products won't leave you out in the rain.

hint.title: API network platform
hint.description: Control network events & actions via API.

easy.title: Simply more productive.
easy.description:
Seamless operation and solutions for nearly impossible projects? AirZen can bring a wealth of project experience to the table, designing network solutions that draw on a broad repertoire of established technologies to meet requirements individually and professionally.
AirZen has a versatile combination of software and hardware components designed to facilitate the entire "Internet & Network" spectrum within industrial projects and provide secure and reliable connectivity.

hint.title: Network tools
hint.description: Networking is a craft. We have got all the tools to do it.

hint.title: 5G, Wi-Fi, LoRa, Linux
hint.description: We speak wireless & Linux, and our API translates.

secure.title: Future-proof, not from yesteryear!
secure.description:
The protection of machinery, facilities, and networks require the use of state-of-the-art technology. AirZen provides highly secure and resilient network management solutions made in Europe, with built-in firewalls and automated updates.
We guarantee the best protection with our in-house hardware, software, and servers in Europe. Moreover, you can keep track of potential problems and manage the network via command line, API, or app. This way, you can be sure to keep on top of things.

cookie.content: We use cookies to personalise our content and ads, offer social media features, and analyse website traffic. During this process, all data records are anonymised and deleted after the evaluation. We never share your data, not even with partners.

items.title: Technology Details
items.description: Technisch versierte Dokumentation der AirZen OS Software.

items.title: Node H6
items.description: Perfekt für private Home-nutzung & Homeoffice. Auch als Mesh-Set.

items.title: Node B6
items.description: Office WLAN Router mit PoE und mehreren Ethernet-Anschlüssen.

items.title: Node m5
items.description: Mobiler Router für extreme Einsätze in rauen Umgebungen.

items.title: Wlan Anfänge
descriptions: Der erste WLAN-Standard wurde der Welt vorgestellt. Das Air Zen Team setzt sich hauptsächlich aus Autodidakten zusammen, die seit ihrer Kindheit eine Leidenschaft für Linux & Netzwerke besitzen.

items.title: Industrielle Projekte
descriptions: Vorgängerprojekte unseres Teams entwickelten in dieser Zeit verschiedene kundenspezifische Industrie-Projekte und führten diese auf Basis eigener WLAN-Hard &-Software durch.
Von Beginn an konnten wir uns durch Technikaffinität an industriellen Sonderlösungen beteiligen. Zahlreiche Projekte ermöglichten uns den Kontakt zu unabhängigen und innovativen Herstellern.

items.title: Learning by doing
descriptions: Ab 2016 fokussierten wir uns maßgeblich auf cloudbasierte Netzwerk-Technologie mit dem Schwerpunkt des Kunden-WLAN. Die zentrale Plattform, um remote Netzwerke zu steuern wurde durch die vorangegangenen Entwicklungen im Bereich Public-WLAN ergänzt: elementare Bestandteile einer ganzheitlichen Lösung für Unternehmensnetzwerke.

items.title: Themenschwerpunkt Sicherheit
descriptions: IT-Security, die wenig Aufmerksamkeit durch ihre Anwender:innen benötigt und automatisiert ihren Dienst verrichtet ist einer unserer Leitsätze für das Jahr 2023. Der Schwerpunkt liegt darauf, Kunden & Nutzer:innen des WLANs vor externen Bedrohungen zu schützen. Parallel zu diesem Schutz steht die weitere Vereinfachung der Cloud-Komponente im Fokus. Ziel ist es, dass jedes Unternehmen selbst seine eigene AirZen-Cloud betreiben kann - mit oder ohne Managed Service über uns.

items.title: Fokus Europa
descriptions: Aus unserer Sicht gibt es Stand 2022 aus Europa keine State-Of-The-Art Netzwerk-Technologie. Auch sind uns abseits der eigenen Aktivitäten keine gleichwertigen Versuche bekannt. Wir möchten uns dieser Herausforderung stellen und planen den Ausbau unseres Ansatzes, um alle Core-Elemente Moderner Netzwerktechnologie abzubilden.
